title.rendered: Man Maintenance: skincare tips for men

content.rendered:
5 skincare tips for men

BODHI Facialist and Spa Trainer, Tegan Hall shares her no-nonsense skin care tips for men.

1. Do not use soap!

Soap is a no-go for the face as it dries out the skin. Don’t be afraid to take a leap into a good all-natural facial routine. At the very least cleanse (with a cleanser) and moisturise! Your skin will thank you for it.

2. Apply sunscreen daily

This is non-negotiable. Sunscreen isn’t just for the beach or outdoor sports. Incidental sun exposure, like the time you spend walking to the train or sipping a beer on the deck after work, adds up and causes skin damage and ageing.

3. Antioxidant boost

Add an antioxidant serum to your routine for added nourishment and protection. After shaving, layer under your moisturiser. Try Mukti Age-Defiance Day Serum.

4. Keep it simple

Look for multi-tasking products. Sodashi’s Clean Skin Cleanser for example, cleanses, gently exfoliates and nourishes the skin, and works as a shaving aid.

5. Exfoliate regularly

Exfoliate 2-3 times a week to reduce congestion and pigmentation. But don’t over-exfoliate as it can irritate the skin. We love Mukti 2-in-1 Resurfacing Exfoliant.

BODHI offers a specialised menu for men, for skin health and radiance.
